CHMOD(8) User Commands CHMOD(8)

NAME

chroot - run a command with a different system root

SYNOPSIS

chroot NEWROOT [COMMAND]

DESCRIPTION

chroot(8) runs the system call chroot(2) to run COMMAND with the root (/) set to NEWROOT.
NEWROOT
The directory to switch the command's system root to.
COMMAND
The command to execute, relative to NEWROOT.

SEE ALSO

cd(1), chroot(2)
